title: BTC Cannot Keep Up With Altcoins
description: Market Overview The crypto market has returned to its historical highs, with a cap of nearly $4.05 trillion, reaching a peak of $4.8 trillion. Major altcoins led by Ethereum (+7.5%), Solana (+12%), Cardano (+8.5%), and Chainlink (+9.3%) contributed to the total growth of 2.3% over the past 24 hours. Bitcoin rose by a modest 0.4% […]The post BTC Cannot Keep Up With Altcoins appeared first on Action Forex.
